scripts.generate: npm run generate-spec && openapi-generator-cli generate && npm run clean-ts-axios && npm run build-redoc
scripts.generate-spec: openapi-generator-cli generate -g openapi-yaml -i ./spec/openapi.yaml -o ../sdks/openapi-yaml && npm run clean-spec
scripts.clean-ts-axios: cd ../sdks/project-ts && rm -rf .openapi-generator && npm i --save typescript@^4.6.3 axios@^0.26.1 @types/axios @types/node@^16.11.26
